name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skippy: The Best YouTube Ad Skipper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically skips youtube ads by speeding them up

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Skippy is a chrome extension that fast-forwards through all video ads on YouTube. Skippy also skips all video ads on websites with YouTube embeds.

Skippy is Ultra-Lightweight, meaning the entire extension is under 1 megabyte. This makes it so that there is absolutely ZERO latency.

This extension is comparably much lighter than most or even all other YouTube ad skippers.

Disclaimer: YouTube is a trademark of Google LLC
